value.title: The Trevor Project has a new AI persona for LGBTQ crisis counseling
value.excerpt: Since the start of 2021, The Trevor Project, the largest suicide prevention organization for LGBTQ young people, has used an AI technology called the Crisis Contact Simulator to train its counselors on how to talk to youth in crisis.

value.title: Unlocking human rights information with machine learning
value.excerpt: Human rights defenders need information from many sources to do their work effectively. value.title: Ancient information combined with Artificial Intelligence aimed at creating wealth and well-being
value.excerpt: The “tea, spices and wellness” project led by Ioncure Tech Pvt Ltd, aims to connect herb cultivators in remote tribal areas with urban consumers, building a sustainable supply chain using AI

value.title: DeepMind experiment shows AI must grow smarter, not just bigger
value.excerpt: The dominant approach to building more advanced artificial intelligences is simply to scale up their computing power, but AI firm DeepMind says we are reaching a point of diminishing returns

value.title: Zuckerberg And Chan Pledge $500 Million Of Their Facebook Fortune To Create An AI Institute At Harvard
value.excerpt: Zuckerberg and Chan, who met at a Harvard fraternity party in 2003, have already given $42 million to Harvard.

value.title: Those Sordid Follow-Home Robberies To First Rise And Then Thankfully Decline During The Coming Era Of AI Self-Driving Cars
value.excerpt: Follow-home robberies are in the news quite a bit. For the coming era of AI self-driving cars, such criminal acts will at first be emboldened and then later be generally overcome as driverless cars become widespread.

value.title: AI Video Platform Synthesia Raises $50 Million In Series B
value.excerpt: AI video platform Synthesia (cofounded by Under 30 honorees) which allows users to quickly make videos using software as opposed to using traditional video production equipment, announced today that it has raised $50 million in a Series B round led by Kleiner Perkins.

value.title: Moderna Stock Is Sold by This Robot Trader. It Bought Tesla and Merck Instead.
value.excerpt: Artificial intelligence-run fund AMOM also loaded up on shares of Netflix, and bet big on a very low-profile medical device specialist.

value.title: Red Hat brings Ansible IT automation engine to Azure
value.excerpt: Red Hat is bringing the Ansible Automation Platform to Microsoft's Azure, helping companies manage and scale their IT environments.

value.title: The Era Of ‘Pervasive AI’ Has Begun: Get Going Or Get Left Behind
value.excerpt: This new era of AI — "pervasive AI" — marks the end of technology paralysis and the beginning of transformation enablement. So, no more excuses. Stop worrying about how AI works and start focusing on what you want it to do for your business.

value.title: Qualcomm's AI chip chief departs to take helm at startup MemryX
value.excerpt: Keith Kressin, the executive who oversaw Qualcomm Inc's artificial intelligence chip efforts, has left to take the top job at a Michigan-based semiconductor startup.

value.title: UK government sets out AI standards roadmap
value.excerpt: The UK’s Centre for Data Ethics and Innovation (CDEI) has published a roadmap for building an “assurance ecosystem” for artificial intelligence (AI).

value.title: AI Trends 2022: Spare Us The Hype, We Want Business Results
value.excerpt: The latest industry analyst predictions about artificial intelligence (AI) are out, and they’re certain to oust a ton of assumptions we’ve made to date.

value.title: Healthcare startup Suki.AI raises $55mn led by March Capital
value.excerpt: Suki.AI Inc, a health-tech start-up, has raised $55 million (around ₹412 crore) in a Series C funding round led by March Capital, the company said in a statement. The round also saw participation from Philips Ventures, and existing investors such as ...

value.title: Time To Ante Up: Three AI Trends Financial Services Should Bet On In 2022

value.title: JPIN announces strategic investment in AI-driven fintech company TSLC
value.excerpt: The new capital will be used to fuel the growth of TSLCs digital lending operations, grow its global talent pool, step up business development, deepen its AI and predictive analytics capabilities and expand into selecting emerging and frontier markets.

value.title: Mumbai-based firm to launch AIoT-enabled driverless car next year. Details here
value.excerpt: Mumbai-based automobile-as-a-service company - Autonomous Intelligence Motors Private Limited (AIMPL) - on Wednesday announced that it will launch an artificial intelligence-of-things (AIoT) powered autonomous car in the country next year.

value.title: Autonomous driving startup Deeproute.ai prices L4 solution at $10,000
value.excerpt: Deeproute.ai, an autonomous vehicle startup with offices in Shenzhen and Fremont, California, unveiled an ambitious self-driving solution on Wednesday. The package, named DeepRoute-Driver 2.0, is a production-ready Level 4 system that costs approximately $10,

value.title: Natural language processing: time is now to advance human language insights for finance industry
value.excerpt: Investments in natural language processing technology are becoming vital to providing market insights for the finance sector, with the capacity to analyse more data and help identify risks and trends.

value.title: Data labeling will fuel the AI revolution
value.excerpt: Labeling data for AI using the right techniques helps companies make better decisions and has a measurable impact on business success.

value.title: Language Modelling at Scale: Gopher, Ethical considerations, and Retrieval
value.excerpt: We are releasing three papers on language models, Gopher, Ethical considerations, and Retrieval.

value.title: Ex-Tesla, Impossible Foods lawyer takes top legal job at robot farming startup
value.excerpt: Myra Pasek, who was the second in-house lawyer hired by Tesla Inc's Elon Musk and the first general counsel for Impossible Foods Inc, is taking on a new startup assignment, joining Silicon Valley-based robotic farming company Iron Ox Inc as general counsel.

value.title: Neuralink and Tesla have an AI problem that Elon’s money can’t solve
value.excerpt: What do Tesla's FSD system, Neuralink's algorithms, and lazy people all have in common? It'd be great if they worked.

value.title: Q&A: More-sustainable concrete with machine learning
value.excerpt: MIT-IBM Watson AI Lab researchers aim to design concrete recipe mixtures that use AI to shrink its environmental footprint and cost, while recycling byproducts and increasing performance.
